entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle this evening. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
